name: Cannon Golf for Android
description:
Don't you want to use the cannons for playing golf?

Shoot the ball and blow up the hole!

Very unique physical puzzle game using the several types of cannons and shells to reach the goal.

The rule is simple. Shoot the balls to reach the goal!

In the game, you can select the type of cannon and balls as selecting the golf club.

Since the second shot the player can strike the ball at the impact area as

If there is a high wall, use "a motor" which has a high trajectory to get over the wall.

If there are blocks, use "an armor-piercing shell" to destroy them.

・3 courses, 54 holes

・side-scrolling game

・It's easy to complete, but very difficult to collect all gold trophies.

・You can play all holes without paying. However, we are glad to receive donations to keep the service and create more games.

◆Reference machines

Nexus5

ARROWS F-01F

XPERIA SO-02F

RAM:2GB

CPU：QualcommSnapdragon 800 MSM8974 2.26GHz

Android version:4.4.2

◆Non-supported

STREAM X GL07S（RAM:1GB）

Work, but slow and some graphic are not displayed.
